sen.j: 新酒（しんしゅ）とは、一般に次の用例で用いられる。
sen.e: Shin shu is used in the following examples:
Shin shu is used in the following examples:
Shin-shu is generally used in the following examples:

sen.j: 現代の日本酒の新酒の一般的な概念については「日本酒熟成」を参照。
sen.e: For a general outline of present day shin shu Japanese rice wine, refer to the publication: `Sake Fermentation`.
For a general outline of present day shin shu Japanese rice wine, refer to the publication: `Sake Fermentation`.
For a general outline of present day shin-shu Japanese rice wine, refer to the publication: 'Sake Fermentation.'
sen.cmt: shin-shuとし、クォーテーション表記を修正、ピリオドの位置を移動

sen.j: 現代の日本酒の新酒の国税庁によるガイドラインについては「日本酒国税庁の清酒の製法品質表示基準による任意記載事項」を参照。
sen.e: For Japan`s National Tax Agency guidelines regarding present day shin shu Japanese sake (rice wine), refer to the publication ` Japan`s National Tax Agency shin shu production quality standard arbitrary items for mention`.

For Japan`s National Tax Agency guidelines regarding present day shin shu Japanese sake (rice wine), refer to the publication ` Japan`s National Tax Agency shin shu production quality standard arbitrary items for mention`.

For Japan's National Tax Agency guidelines regarding present day shin shu Japanese sake (rice wine), refer to the publication 'Japan's National Tax Agency shin-shu production quality standard arbitrary items for mention.'
sen.cmt: アポストロフィー、クォーテーション表記を修正、余分なスペース消去、ピリオドの位置を移動、shin-shuとしました。

sen.j: 江戸時代の日本酒の四季醸造における新酒の位置づけについては「四季醸造」を参照。
sen.e: For the standing of shin shu amongst Japanese rice wine brewed across the four seasons in Edo period Japan, refer to the publication `Four-Season Brewing`.
For the standing of shin shu amongst Japanese rice wine brewed across the four seasons in Edo period Japan, refer to the publication `Four-Season Brewing`.
For the standing of shin-shu amongst Japanese rice wine brewed across the four seasons in Edo period Japan, refer to the publication 'Four-Season Brewing.'
sen.cmt: shin-shuとし、クォーテーション表記を修正、ピリオドの位置を移動

sen.j: 中世末までの日本酒の新酒の古酒に対する位置づけについては「日本酒安土桃山時代」を参照。
sen.e: Refer to the publication `Azuchi Momoyama period Shin Shu` for the position of ancient shin shu Japanese rice wine until mediaeval times.
Refer to the publication `Azuchi Momoyama period Shin Shu` for the position of ancient shin shu Japanese rice wine until mediaeval times.
Refer to the publication 'Azuchi Momoyama period Shin-shu' for the position of ancient shin-shu Japanese rice wine until mediaeval times.
sen.cmt: クォーテーション表記を修正、Shin-shu、shin-shuとしました。

sen.j: ワインにおけるヌーヴォー（nouveau）などの新酒についてはワインを参照。
sen.e: Refer to publications about wine for `nouveau` style wines.
Refer to publications about wine for `nouveau` style wines.
Refer to publications about wine for 'nouveau' style wines.
sen.cmt: クォーテーション表記を修正

sen.j: 焼酎の新酒については焼酎を参照。
sen.e: Refer to shochu (distilled spirit) related publications regarding `nouveau` style shochu.
Refer to shochu (distilled spirit) related publications regarding `nouveau` style shochu.
Refer to shochu (distilled spirit) related publications regarding 'nouveau' style shochu.
sen.cmt: クォーテーション表記を修正
